title: Cryogen
author: Darkmega5
pages:
The Calamity mod is
one of if not the
biggest content mod
for terraria. Recently,
It got a huge update.
None of the new
bosses fit antartica,
so I decided to build
an old classic.
Cryogen is an early
hardmode boss fought
in the snow biome.

In the lore, it's a
prison for the
archmage Permafrost
(not shown in this
build.) The fight was
originally made as an
alternative to the
Destroyer, but has
since become its own
standalone boss. Not
gonna include details
of the fight, just in
case RT decides
to play Calamity in the
future.

Build by Darkmega5
